entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
